attributes.action: I would like sanctions put on israel
attributes.additional_details: evidence is clear and transparent if needed which i think is quite black white can be presented
attributes.background: The support for palistine is so unreal and the crimes commited by the state of israel are long over being held accountable a start would be the world to sanction any trade as we have done for president putin saddam hussain who are in the view of the international community less of a criminal regime

rejection.details:
Your petition asks for the world to impose sanctions on Israel. The UK Government and Parliament don't have the power to make the whole world do this.

You might want to create a new petition, asking specifically for the UK Government and Parliament to take action.
